file_content.text: Too bad there aren't more of them. I was just getting warmed up.
And what do we have here? Ah--Cerik's failsafe code.
Just punch this in, and... there! The power grid's overloading. So long, Republic!
With the Republic gone, nothing will save this planet from destruction.
Finally. Taris is ours.
You and Gravus can celebrate together. Meanwhile, I'll... wait a second.
This explosion's going to light up Taris.
Time to enjoy the fireworks.
Let's hope the Republic sees... wait a second.
I know a nice, private ship where we can enjoy the sight.
[Flirt] Escape with me.
Well, I suppose if there was ever a time for celebration... wait a second.
Let's get out of here.
Wait. This is too perfect.
I have to admit--you were actually useful.
Good work.
I always deliver. You'd know that if... wait a second.
Those transports that brought Cerik's backup--they're loaded with civilians. They're actually trying to open the hangar--they'll escape the explosion!
Lock the hangar doors. Make this spaceport their grave.
Seal them inside to die.
My pleasure. Too bad we can't stick around to watch.
Open the hangar. They've already lost enough.
Let the civilians go.
You really know how to sap the joy out of a good massacre.
The hangar's open. And there they go.... What a waste.
Anyway--this place is about to explode. Much as I'd like to see you disintegrated, I'd suggest you run. Or stay, see if I care.
You've outlived your usefulness, Thana.
So long. [Kill Thana]
I should've killed you ten times over. Serves me right for showing mercy....
The galaxy's a big place. Try not to get killed.
Goodbye, Thana.
I can take care of myself just fine.
The longer we chat, the more Republic scum escape my lightsaber.
I had them under control!
We need to kill Cerik and blow this place. Now.
Focus on the mission.
Way ahead of you.
Your form was perfection. Show me a few of your best moves?
[Flirt] You sure did.
Keep your eyes off me and on these Republic dogs.
Looked to me like they had you beat.
That's not what I saw.
You're not the only woman who knows how to handle herself.
Shut up.
You're lucky I need you, for now.
Since you finally disabled the Republic's safety measures, I can force their power grid to go critical and... what?
Argh! The spaceport's set to blow, but those blasted Jedi installed a failsafe!
Let's find Cerik and rip the override code from his dead hands!
Pathetic scum!
I'll make you scream!
Die!
Good--more victims!
This is going to be easy!
